item.title: Atlas of the Heart
item.description: Worrying and anxiety go together, but worry is not an emotion; it is the thinking part of anxiety. Avoidance will make you feel less vulnerable in the short run, but will never make you less afraid.

item.title: What My Bones Know
item.description: [[Stephanie Foo]] [[Ballantine Books]] Incredible memoir. One of the best books Iâ€™ve read about healing from abuse, dysfunction, and trauma.
